Package com.scriptedmc.script.inventory

Inventory classes like player inventory or block inventory

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SMCInventory
    Any inventory (block inventory for example) Script array with update() method to send changes to client (if it's a container), clear() method to clear contents and serialization with serialize():NBTListProxy and deserialize(data:NBTListProxy) Example use (Javascript): var inventory = block.inventory; print(inventory[5].id); inventory[3] = new SMCItemStack("minecraft:cookie", 5); inventory.update();
    SMCPlayerInventory
    Represents player inventory Script array with `update()` method to send changes to client, clear() method to clear contents and serialization with serialize():NBTCompoundProxy and deserialize(data:NBTCompoundProxy) Also has subarrays for different slot groups (main, armor, offhand, current and currentSlot (selected slot number) ) Example use (Javascript): var inventory = player.inventory; print(inventory[5].id); print("Selected slot number: " + inventory.currentSlot); inventory[3] = new SMCItemStack("minecraft:cookie", 5); inventory.armor[2] = new SMCItemStack("minecraft:diamond_chestplate"); inventory.update();

Package com.scriptedmc.script.inventory Description
